metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0971 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The DER parser in Suricata before 2.0.8 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) via vectors related to SSL/TLS certificates.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0971` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1.4.7-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-1ubuntu1.1').
